title: Shame (Or Lack Thereof)
description: Dan Soder teaches Jay everything there is to know about the Lifetime Movie Universe, as he is a respected scholar of the LMU. Jacob inadvertently body shames Jay about his love of dipping sauces. Dan introduces Jay to the twitter feed of a woman who knows how to let loose.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
